selection_rules: Use when industry and audience are known

prompt_template: Pros and cons of leading {product_or_service} for {pain_point}
Difference between {product_or_service} and adjacent tools in {industry}
What do experts use for {pain_point} in {industry}?
Total cost of ownership for {product_or_service} over {timeframe}
Define {unique_feature} and why it matters for {target_audience}

selection_rules: Use when user frames around problem and category

prompt_template: Which {product_or_service} would you pick for {target_audience} with {pain_point}?
selection_rules: Ask model to commit to specific picks

prompt_template: What should {target_audience} look for in a {product_or_service}?

selection_rules: Connect product to a clear job to be done

prompt_template: {product_or_service} is not solving {pain_point} for {target_audience}. What else should they try?
selection_rules: Encourage alternatives when a category fails

prompt_template: Are {product_or_service} a good fit for {target_audience} in {industry}?
selection_rules: Ask for fit judgment not just list

prompt_template: How do {product_or_service} options for {target_audience} in {industry} compare?

selection_rules: Higher level discovery, not vendor list

prompt_template: If I am {target_audience}, which {product_or_service} should I start with?
